description: Rectangular shield with two snakehead-like protrusions, top and bottom edges on short sides; applied vertical band between snakeheads with incised V's; applied decoration in two outer panels; handle on back is two C-shapes at right angles
markings: White paint, on back, \'239\'; sticker, under scotch tape and minor, in crevices, on front; scattered orange accretions front and back
title: Goldweight [Shield]
